name: Wizardry Online
description:
Wizardry Online is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Gamepot. It was originally released in 2013. Sony Interactive Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Wizardry Online on PC.
It was produced by Jose Araiza, Keishi Iwahara and Oliver Smith. It was directed by Kenji Tokita. It was scored by Akimasa Shibata, Maki Kirioka, Natsumi Kameoka and Shunsuke Tsuchiya.
